name: @ondewo/vtsi-client-angular
description: Ondewo voice telephone system integration client library for angular

scripts.build: git submodule update --init --recursive --remote && docker run -it -v ${PWD}:/input-volume -v ${PWD}/..:/output-volume ondewo-angular-proto-compiler ondewo-vtsi-api ondewo

author: ONDEWO GmbH
